plugins.name: linus-droid
plugins.description: Linus Droid is an AI-powered virtual assistant designed to help users with various tasks on their Android devices. It can manage apps, set reminders, answer questions, and provide personalized recommendations to enhance user experience.

plugins.name: pm-expert
plugins.description: A 20+ year experienced PM that helps clarify requirements, asks probing questions, and suggests scope breakdown for better project planning.

plugins.name: sa-expert
plugins.description: A senior Solution Architect that analyzes system structure, evaluates architecture patterns, reviews code organization, and suggests improvements.

plugins.name: tech-spec
plugins.description: A senior Tech Lead that transforms PRD into detailed technical specifications with data models, APIs, and implementation plans.

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: A senior Code Reviewer that verifies implementation matches specifications, reviews code quality, and ensures best practices.

plugins.name: implementer
plugins.description: A senior Developer that strictly implements code following the technical specification - no deviations, no additions, spec-compliant only.

plugins.name: qa-expert
plugins.description: A senior QA Engineer that generates test plans, guides TDD workflow, and ensures comprehensive test coverage.

plugins.name: kratos
plugins.description: The God of War - Master orchestrator that commands all specialist plugins, enforces workflow gates, tracks feature progress, and guides features from inception to completion.
